title: Remove spam/blocked numbers from call history automatically?
content:
I receive a dozen spam/blocked calls a day.  How do I remove these calls from my recent calls history list automatically?

I would like to use my recent calls history to make return calls, but I find myself scrolling through hundreds of blocked/spam numbers to find the one I want.

I can delete each spam call from the list manually, but it is a huge waste of time if I have to do that task dozens of times a day...
